original_title: China reaffirms sovereignty over Taiwan, says complete reunification unstoppable
article_summary: China reaffirms its sovereignty over Taiwan, stating that the Treaty of San Francisco is illegal and cannot change the fact that Taiwan is part of China. The complete reunification of China is considered an unstoppable historical trend, and any attempts at Taiwan independence are condemned. The one-China principle is emphasized as the political foundation for China's diplomatic relations.</s>
